1512780.name: ワニワニアタック
1512780.description:
There is no crocodile to play at the resort! !!
Get rid of the crocodile!
You can get points by driving away the crocodile.
Drive away a lot of crocodiles and hit a lot of points.

If you drive away the animals of Crocodile Integu, you will lose points.
Be careful and let's pass only the crocodile.

If you connect ST32 and ST32R sold by Atec with USB, you can also use it as an air gun.
Please click the mouse.

Get rid of a lot of crocodiles and get a high score.
1512780.supported_languages:
日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
